product_name: LAMO Camper Tall Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring rugged style with an urban edge, the LAMO Trapper Boots offer knee-high coverage to provide maximum warmth on cold, wintry days. Synthetic leather uppers provide flexible, durable support; knee-high coverage adds warmth. Polyester shearling linings offer cozy yet breathable insulation. EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and support. Durable thermoplastic rubber outsoles on the LAMO Camper Tall Boots provide traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring rugged style with an urban edge, the LAMO Trapper Boots offer knee-high coverage to provide maximum warmth on cold, wintry days.
